name: brackets-utf8-converter
title: Brackets Extension - UTF8 converter
description: Allows you to convert single files or whole folders (and sufolders) to UTF8. This project is a fork of Az-Encode <https://github.com/Azakur4/Az-Encode>, written by Jimmy Brian Anamaria Torres <captasfire@hotmail.com>.
author: Gabriel GASNOT <gabriel.gasnot@gmail.com>
